short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block potentially danerous files from being downloaded.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is intended to be deployed by administrative policies, or installed normally for use by less-tech-savvy users, for the purpose of preventing the download of files with extensions that are potentially dangerous.

GitHub source - https://github.com/aghorler/Potentially-Dangerous-File-Extension-Blocker
